ygData.subject: RE: Binding in Ogguk
ygData.msgSnippet: Storage corpse!  Duh, good idea!  You planes runners can leave your coffins this way too!  Except you d leave em on a storage corpse in the plane/zone where
ygData.messageBody:
Storage corpse! Duh, good idea! You planes runners can leave your coffins
this way too! Except you'd leave 'em on a storage corpse in the plane/zone
where you fight so you can consent the necro when he is gonna summon your
corpse???

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 2:29 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Binding in Ogguk

From: <kim@...>

On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> I had no problems being bound in Oggok when making the
PoF run.
> The flute will disappear as quick as anything else
would. 5 mins?
> I dunno, drop some foraged grubs on the ground and start
a timer.

Load up with flutes in your main inventory. Duel a friend
in
Ogguk. Let him kill you. Come back, loot all items except
the flutes.
